item.title: Moussaka (Greek)
item.description: Try this with a Greek Salad. Ingredients Ingredient Standard Standard Unit Weight 1 Unit 1 Weight 2 Unit 2 Potatoes (russet) 0.38 potatoes Oil (olive) 1 tbsp. Onion 0.25 onion Zucchinis (medium) 0.25 zucc. Eggplants 0.25 eggpl. Garlic 0.
